articles.description: Minutes after Real Madrid fans were singing for Vinicius Jr to win the Ballon d'Or, the Brazil forward insisted he wants to "stay at the club forever".
articles.title: 'Extraordinary' Vinicius Jr favourite for Ballon d'Or

articles.description: Aston Villa make it three wins out of three in the Champions League with victory over Bologna at a raucous Villa Park.
articles.title: Aston Villa 2-0 Bologna: John McGinn and Jhon Duran score in Champions League win

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says defender Riccardo Calafiori's injury during the 1-0 win over Shakhtar Donetsk is " a bit of a worry."
articles.title: Riccardo Calafiori: Injury 'a worry' for Arsenal who have 'questions to answer' after Shakhtar win

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says he is fit enough to play a greater role with the ball after England pick three spinners for the deciding Test in Pakistan.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Ben Stokes ready to bowl more on 'raked' pitch

articles.description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery says he has no problem with Jhon Duran's reaction after the forward was seen kicking the back of a seat in the dugout after being brought off.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Jhon Duran 'on fire' but under Unai Emery's 'control'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Borussia Dortmund in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Borussia Dortmund: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: The Commonwealth Games will take place in 2026 after Glasgow stepped in to host, but the stripped-back event has left some celebrating and others disappointed.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Biggest winners and losers as Glasgow 2026 reveals 10 sports included

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from PSG vs PSV in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: PSG vs PSV: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Former Barcelona boss Xavi has held discussions with Manchester United, Sevilla are interested in taking Tottenham defender Archie Gray on loan, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Xavi, Gray, Acheampong, Porro, Zych, Wilshere

articles.description: In a special interview, England spinners Shoaib Bashir and Rehan Ahmed talk about their heritage, speaking Urdu to the opposition and praying with the Pakistan team.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Shoaib Bashir and Rehan Ahmed on their heritage
